author: Wayne Collins
description: Smooth as you like. The orange is surprisingly evident.
name: Chocolate Puff
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
30 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
